parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the principal moments of inertia: [ Px, Py, Pz ]

title: IMassPropertyOverrideOptions.SetOverridePrincipalMomentsOfInertia
description: Overrides the calculated principal moments of inertia of the model currently being edited.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: Array of three doubles of the principal moments of inertia: [ Px, Py, Pz ]

returns: True if the prinicpal moments of inertia are successfully overridden, false if not
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IMassPropertyOverrideOptions::OverrideMomentsOfInertia
is set to true.
